Title: Relates to educational or training work activity requirements
Summary: Relates to educational or training work activity requirements; allows a local social services district to count an hour of homework time per course credit hour towards work participation requirements for public assistance recipients participating in educational or training activities.
LawCode: Amd ยง336, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to educational or training work activity requirements
